#summary Instructions on how to install the plugin

= Installation steps =
 1) Load eclipse
 2) Goto Help
 3) click on Install new software...
 4) Click on [add]
 5) Give it a name (i.e. IMP)
 6) In the location field type:
      http://impsim.googlecode.com/svn/update_site/
 7) continue through the wizard
